department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of two (2) Aquatic Invasive Species Decontamination Pressure Wash Trailers for Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
### Decontamination Trailer Tender Announcement
#### Government of Canada
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of two (2) Aquatic Invasive Species Decontamination Pressure Wash Trailers to Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) in Salmon Arm, British Columbia.

**Description and Requirements**
DFO in Salmon Arm, British Columbia, requires a decontamination pressure wash trailer to help contain the spread of aquatic invasive species. Funding for this project is being provided by the Government of Canada.

**Key Details**

* Tender Title: F1591-240010 - Decontamination Trailer
* Solicitation Number: WS4321025546
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18712281
* Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Selection Criteria**
The tender will be awarded based on the "Lowest Price" criterion.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Location**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) in Salmon Arm, British Columbia.

**Procurement**
This is a competitive tendering process open to all qualified suppliers. Suppliers must register in the SAP Ariba system to participate.

**Contact Information**
For any questions or clarifications, please contact Kenny Seeto at kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### End of Tender Announcement
